org.drools.ruleflow.core
Interface RuleFlowProcess

All Superinterfaces:
Process, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RuleFlowProcessImpl
public interface RuleFlowProcess
extends Process

Represents a RuleFlow process.

addNode

void addNode(Node node)
Method for adding a node to this RuleFlow process. Note that the node will get an id unique for this process.

getImports

java.util.List getImports()
Returns the imports of this RuleFlow process. They are defined as a List of fully qualified class names.

Parameters:

getGlobals

java.util.Map getGlobals()
Returns the globals of this RuleFlow process. They are defined as a Map with the name as key and the type as value.

Returns:
the imports of this RuleFlow process
